title: Sree Vidyanikethan Engineering College - [SVEC], Tirupati - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026
meta_description: Sree Vidyanikethan Engineering College - [SVEC], Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, B.Tech, B.Tech {Lateral}, M.Tech . 38 Courses. Average Fees is 70000 per year.

Section.name: About SVEC
Section.description:
Sree Vidyanikethan engineering college is the best private college in the Rayalaseema region in Andhra pradesh.
Sree Vidyanikethan Engineering College (SVEC) is situated in lush green and scenic surroundings, 16 km from the famous temple-town of Tirupati. It has over the years produced many brilliant engineering students who have made a mark for themselves and brought laurels to the Country.
As per the dream of Chairman Dr.M.Mohan babu to provide best educational facilities in backward region Rayalaseema, Sree Vidyanikethan Engineering college was started in 1996 with an intake of 180. Now the intake has grown exponentially to 2232.
It is offering 8 B.Tech programs and 8 M.tech programs. College has started 2nd shift polytechnic from the year 2009-10. College is accredited by NBA and has agreements with multinational companies like TCS,IBM etc. College is determined to enhance the technical abilities and development of student in all categories and make him a perfect citizen of India. College is given Autonomous status by the UGC, New Delhi from the year 2010-11.

Central Library : Library has 78493 Volumes, 13864 Titles and 154 National Journals. Library is also equipped with Internet facility. The College library being a member of the Developing Library Network (DELNET) has access to the vast resources of the latter and also it is a member of British council and American Library. The College Library is fully automated using SOUL package developed by the INFLIBNET of UGC. Library is also equipped with Internet facility.

Scholarship :
SVET provide scholarship for those students, who are keen at studying but due to unwanted circumstances cannot afford paying so much of fees.
Essentially students from BC, SC and ST might be given concessions. Grant dependent upon Merit is additionally given to the hard working applicants. In this manner, the part of the college is to nurture every single with the intention that everyone investigates and improves the aforementioned regular blessings.
